full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I TSE SGRUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS DGA' BCU SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR DANG, DBU MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYI RIM GROR PHRAL DU TSE SGRUB DGOS SKABS TSOGS PA'I ZHAL 'DON DU 'DI 'DRA DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR ` ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,)
